caption.title: Expected autochthonous cases in 2017, assuming revised county R 0 estimates through September 2017.
caption.p: The probability distributions are built from 10,000 simulations, each randomly drawing from the R 0 posterior distributions. The dashed blue line indicates the actual number of detected autochthonous cases in state (one), and the solid black lines indicates the mean expected number of autochthonous cases for the baseline importation scenario, in which only the reported importations occurred (top) and the increased importation scenario, in which a large fraction of importations went undetected (bottom).
